verses.verse: It happened, <S%H1732><s%> when David lived <S%H3427><s%> in his house, <S%H1004><s%> that David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Nathan <S%H5416><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> "Behold, <S%H3427><s%> I dwell in a house <S%H1004><s%> of cedar, <S%H730><s%> but the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is under curtains. <S%H3407><s%>"
Nathan <S%H5416><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to David, <S%H1732><s%> "Do <S%H6213><s%> all that is in your heart; <S%H3824><s%> for God is with you. <S%H430><s%>"
It happened the same night, <S%H3915><s%> that the word <S%H1697><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came to Nathan, <S%H5416><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Go <S%H3212><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my servant, <S%H5650><s%> <S%H559><s%> 'Thus says Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "You shall not build <S%H1129><s%> me a house <S%H1004><s%> to dwell in; <S%H3427><s%>

for I have not lived in <S%H3427><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> since the day <S%H3117><s%> that I brought up <S%H5927><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to this day, <S%H3117><s%> but have gone from tent <S%H168><s%> to tent, <S%H168><s%> and from one tent to another. <S%H4908><s%>

In all places in which I have walked <S%H1980><s%> with all Israel, <S%H3478><s%> did I speak <S%H1696><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> with any <S%H259><s%> of the judges <S%H8199><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whom I commanded <S%H6680><s%> to be shepherd <S%H7462><s%> of my people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H1129><s%> 'Why have you not built me a house <S%H1004><s%> of cedar? <S%H730><s%>'"'

"Now therefore, <S%H559><s%> you shall tell my servant <S%H5650><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> <S%H559><s%> 'Thus says Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> "I took <S%H3947><s%> you from the sheep pen, <S%H5116><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> the sheep, <S%H6629><s%> that you should be prince <S%H5057><s%> over my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

I have been with you wherever you have gone, <S%H1980><s%> and have cut off <S%H3772><s%> all your enemies <S%H341><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you. <S%H6213><s%> I will make you a name, <S%H8034><s%> like the name <S%H8034><s%> of the great ones <S%H1419><s%> who are in the earth. <S%H776><s%>

I will appoint <S%H7760><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> for my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and will plant <S%H5193><s%> them, <S%H7931><s%> that they may dwell in their own place, <S%H7264><s%> and be moved no more; <S%H1121><s%> neither shall the children of wickedness <S%H5766><s%> waste <S%H1086><s%> them any more, <S%H3254><s%> as at the first, <S%H7223><s%>

and from the day <S%H3117><s%> that I commanded <S%H6680><s%> judges <S%H8199><s%> to be over my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and I will subdue <S%H3665><s%> all your enemies. <S%H341><s%> Moreover I tell <S%H5046><s%> you that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will build <S%H1129><s%> you a house. <S%H1004><s%>

It shall happen, <S%H3117><s%> when your days are fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> that you must go <S%H3212><s%> to be with your fathers, <S%H1><s%> that I will set up <S%H6965><s%> your seed <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you, <S%H1121><s%> who shall be of your sons; and I will establish <S%H3559><s%> his kingdom. <S%H4438><s%>
He shall build <S%H1129><s%> me a house, <S%H1004><s%> and I will establish <S%H3559><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> <S%H99999><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>

I will be his father, <S%H1><s%> and he shall be my son. <S%H1121><s%> I will not take <S%H5493><s%> my loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> from him, <S%H5493><s%> as I took it from him that was before you; <S%H6440><s%>

but I will settle <S%H5975><s%> him in my house <S%H1004><s%> and in my kingdom <S%H4438><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%> His throne <S%H3678><s%> shall be established <S%H3559><s%> <S%H99999><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>"'"
According to all these words, <S%H1697><s%> and according to all this vision, <S%H2377><s%> so Nathan <S%H5416><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to David. <S%H1732><s%>

Then David <S%H1732><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> went <S%H935><s%> in, <S%H3427><s%> and sat before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> "Who am I, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh God, <S%H430><s%> and what is my house, <S%H1004><s%> that you have brought <S%H935><s%> me thus far? <S%H1988><s%>

This was a small thing <S%H6994><s%> in your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> God; <S%H430><s%> but you have spoken <S%H1696><s%> of your servant <S%H5650><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> for a great while to come, <S%H7350><s%> and have respected <S%H7200><s%> me according to the estate <S%H8448><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%> of high degree, <S%H4609><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>

What can <S%H3254><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> say yet more <S%H3254><s%> to you concerning the honor <S%H3519><s%> which is done to your servant? <S%H5650><s%> For you know <S%H3045><s%> your servant. <S%H5650><s%>

Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> for your servant <S%H5650><s%>'s sake, <S%H3820><s%> and according to your own heart, you have worked <S%H6213><s%> all this greatness, <S%H1420><s%> to make known <S%H3045><s%> all these great things. <S%H1420><s%>
Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> there is none like you, <S%H430><s%> neither is there any God besides <S%H2108><s%> you, <S%H8085><s%> according to all that we have heard with our ears. <S%H241><s%>

What one <S%H259><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%> is like your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whom God <S%H430><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to redeem <S%H6299><s%> to himself for a people, <S%H5971><s%> to make <S%H7760><s%> you a name <S%H8034><s%> by great <S%H1420><s%> and awesome <S%H3372><s%> things, <S%H1644><s%> in driving out nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> your people, <S%H5971><s%> whom you redeem <S%H6299><s%> out of Egypt? <S%H4714><s%>

For your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> you made <S%H5414><s%> your own people <S%H5971><s%> <S%H99999><s%> forever; <S%H5769><s%> and you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, became their God. <S%H430><s%>

Now, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, let the word <S%H1697><s%> that you have spoken <S%H1696><s%> concerning your servant, <S%H5650><s%> and concerning his house, <S%H1004><s%> be established <S%H539><s%> <S%H99999><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> as you have spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

Let your name <S%H8034><s%> be established <S%H539><s%> and magnified <S%H1431><s%> <S%H99999><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh of Armies <S%H6635><s%> is the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> even a God <S%H430><s%> to Israel. <S%H3478><s%> The house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> is established <S%H3559><s%> before you. <S%H6440><s%>'

For you, <S%H430><s%> my God, have revealed <S%H1540><s%> to your servant <S%H5650><s%> that you will build <S%H1129><s%> him a house. <S%H1004><s%> Therefore your servant <S%H5650><s%> has found <S%H4672><s%> courage to pray <S%H6419><s%> before you. <S%H6440><s%>
Now, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, you are God, <S%H430><s%> and have promised <S%H1696><s%> this good <S%H2896><s%> thing to your servant. <S%H5650><s%>

Now it has pleased <S%H2974><s%> you to bless <S%H1288><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of your servant, <S%H5650><s%> that it may continue forever <S%H5769><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you; <S%H3068><s%> for you, Yahweh, have blessed, <S%H1288><s%> and it is blessed <S%H1288><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>"
